If THIS app could rate pre-installed (bloatware) on the device, and offer DEVICE SPECIFIC instruction to turn them off/delete them, it should get 10 stars and be worth $4.99!!

title: Well Done Developer/s

Allows you to uninstall apps, target specific permissions i.e what app has root access or system access. Also explains, what the permissions mean. Some apps have access they don't need, i.e a torch that can modify or delete your contacts. Permission Friendly is on all my devices. Very user friendly & I have no complaints.

title: THE BEST !!!!
comment: This is simply THE BEST app you can install. Period. The beauty of this app is its universal usage. Every app has a limited scope based on which service it provides. Whereas the main use of this app is that it evalutes the intrusiveness of every app that you install. I had known that some apps are more intrusive than others, some require access to secure locations on your phone where sensitive data is stored while other apps are less intrusive in providing the same service. Ever since I have installed this app, I check each and every new app that I install on my phone to see how intrusive it is. The scoring system gives an instant idea of the level of intrusivity of any app. I can't imagine anyone not using this app if they are concerned about the security of their personal information.

comment: Downloading apps is like walking on a minefield these days with all the shady apps out there.   Google is no help, android by design, and the market place seems to be designed to share all your information if you make one wrong click. I wish they would include a firewall and permissions manager at the system level so I wouldn't have to root.  Thanks for a great app and making android a little more secure. Someone has to as Google sure isn't doing too much.
Love this app app!!! Great job.

title: Useful app, more useful than you think
comment: I have been nervous about permissions since I got my Android phone, information and privacy are everything these days.This is one of the first apps I picked up and it has done what it said it would, detect the permissions of each app and organize them. It requires no permissions and is ad free, what more could someone ask for? It is always good to keep up on permissions and this app does that flawlessly.

title: BE INFORMED! Best app! 5stars
comment: Informative -Easy to navigate -Detailed-Safe+Secure** This app breaks down exactly what PERSONAL INFO you are giving permission to access & all the risks. title: Easy to use & works well
comment: It is easy to sort the apps by their danger score, and the danger score seems to be quite accurate about how bad an app is, so you can quickly see which apps you should examine closer.  Trusted apps can be hidden, and although you cannot hide apps by trusted developers, that isn't really needed since it already hides built-in apps & anything by Google (which is how I like it but it would be nice if this could be configured).  The GUI is easy to use, and examining an app (thankfully!) displays in a separate 'window' (thus not cluttering the display).  The developer has clearly gone for ease of use, although this does mean it lacks a few advanced features (e.g. showing all apps which use a particular permission).  It is well worth installing!
